newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Microsoft EPS view raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Microsoft EPS view raised.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said it raised its fiscal 1997 earnings estimate on Microsoft Corp to $2.33 a share from $2.10 after the company reported higher fiscal second quarter earnings on Friday.
-- Hambrecht forecast earnings of $2.70 a share for 1998.

-- Hambrecht & Quist noted Microsoft's strong sales of Windows 95 and Windows NT 4.0 in the December quarter and said its recently launched Office 97 software package bolsters earnings confidence going forward.
-- Hambrecht maintains a long-term buy rating on Microsoft, whose shares were up 4-3/4 at 91-7/8.
